koohiiStory1: You put your ear next to a womans crotch...and somehow, from it, you hear the words "Take me....".
koohiiStory2: Fuaburisu´s with a twist: You know that classic trick where someone pretends to take something out of an someone else´s ear (such as a coin). Instead of a cigarette or a pen he pulls the person’s crotch out of their ear. Very painful!
kunYomi: と.る、と.り、と.り-、とり、-ど.り
myStory: lấy. tai và tay phải. tay phải lấy tai. tai và hơn thế

at once, first of all, for the time being
to treat, to handle, to deal in

to manage, to control, to supervise
to collect, to extort, to appoint, to promote
to act as an agent for, to announce (someone), to convey (a message)
to remove, to take away, to set apart

to order, to send away for
to capture, to occupy, to usurp
to take charge of, to take over, to retire to a private place
